    		School of Nursing
    	Now Hiring: Assistant or Associate ProfessorThe Chico State School of Nursing is looking for a new Assistant or Associate Professor to join their team(opens in new window).CCNE Accreditation                 The basic BSN and MSN programs at California State University, Chico are accredited by the Commission on Collegiate Nursing Education. You can read more about the accreditation by visiting the Commission on Collegiate Nursing Education(opens in new window).Nurses Climate ChallengeOur changing climate demands #climateaction. Chico State School of Nursing has proudly adopted the #NursesClimateChallenge #SchoolofNursingCommitment. We're preparing future nurses by teaching them about the health impacts of climate change using resources from @RNClimateChal(opens in new window).Best Online Nursing Program              We are proud to share that California State University-Chico has been named one of today’s best schools for online higher education in healthcare by EduMed.org. To read more visit EduMed.org Press Release. Best BSN Degree Programs           We are proud to share that California State University-Chico has been named one of today’s best schools for BSN Degrees by BestAccreditedColleges.org. To read more visit BestAccreditedColleges.org Ranking List. Nursing Programs at Chico State

Pre-Nursing Informational VideoPlease check out the link below for the Pre-Nursing Informational Video!Pre-Nursing Informational Video(opens in new window)**This video is being provided as a service to applicants interested in applying to the basic Bachelor of Science in Nursing program at CSU, Chico and is for informational purposes only. This video in no way provides all the necessary requirements for applying to the program. Potential applicants are responsible for reviewing the Admission Criteria, Points Distribution and Instructions document (pdf above) in its entirety AND to follow ALL instructions provided in the NursingCAS application.

We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
